channel.title: The Economy
channel.description:
Ok basically since old wilderness and free trade came out, the economy just got worse, worse, and worse. It's getting more worse everyday. How? Well, if your poor, your staying poor, and the rich are getting richer, since rares are going up. A lot. Regular items such as AGS, claws, are going down 50% basically. Claws used to be 32m now their at 16m? Lol thats just fucked up. So overpowered for so cheap. Also, AGS, 47m..? I remember it used to be at like its highest point, 120m.
/discuss?

item.title: The Economy
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

As long as the prices go up and everyone makes more cash, Nothing is wrong with the market.

Read full topic

item.title: The Economy
item.dc:creator: @DevilsCape DevilsCape
item.description:
@DevilsCape wrote:

T4_:

You guys are fucking retarded. The economy isn’t fucked and never was. If you’re complaining because your shitty 80 woodcutting can’t earn you bills, then you clearly don’t understand how markets evolve over time.

totally agree with u

Read full topic

item.title: The Economy
item.dc:creator: @mihalich mihalich
item.description:
@mihalich wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:13, topic:401422”]Supply and demand. It’s how the game fucking works.

Natural resources - logs, fish, etc., are easy to supply because of how many bots there are.

Partyhats, Santas, etc. - you can’t bot rares. Everyday there are less and less of them.

The game has almost always been like this, you’re just noticing it now.[/quote]

^

Read full topic

item.title: The Economy
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

At least the money and items are all dropping at the same rate(For the most part), So honestly nothing has changed.

Read full topic

item.title: The Economy
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

Supply and demand. It’s how the game fucking works.

Natural resources - logs, fish, etc., are easy to supply because of how many bots their are.

Partyhats, Santas, etc. - you can’t bot rares. Everyday there are less and less of them.

The game has almost always been like this, you’re just noticing it now.

Read full topic

item.title: The Economy
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

Why do people post without even researching? This is how the runescape economy has always worked, it’s in the nature of the entire game design. Deal with and stop qqing.

Read full topic

Holy shit a guy did that for me to… That shows how rich people are. Except this guy was high and was like… time to deliver the package Messing with me and shit acting like a ninja, and it goes on for hours and I ended up 50m higher.

item.title: The Economy
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

anthonyduka:

Yeah. That’s true. A good game is going to die because of people being too lazy to get their own money/stats. -.-

Every game has botters, hackers, and those who will cheat to get ahead. RuneScape has had these since a week after it was made, prices go up and down. Yes some of it is to blame on bots but some things like claws go up and down drastically.

Read full topic

item.description:

item.title: The Economy
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

More like bots are preventing the prices of raw materials to go sky high, thus causing a chain reaction that would then cause the crash.

Davidi2:

It’s a giant circle, you can’t look at one part and get the full picture.

In any economy you have the producers, in this games case the producers are bots.

Read full topic

item.title: The Economy
item.dc:creator: @TimeBroken TimeBroken
item.description:
@TimeBroken wrote:

There’s not really much to discuss. Bots are taking over and the economy is crashing, and JaGeX won’t do anything about the bots, due to the masses of money they bring them.

Read full topic

item.title: The Economy
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

If you ask me, spreading the higher hitting weapons around is more fair than leaving them to the rich, letting them get more rich via PvP.

It’s a giant circle, you can’t look at one part and get the full picture.

Read full topic
